page.shortlink: flying start genie global properties tab
page.description: Specify global properties for both the Grid and Tabbed UI Components generated by the Flying Start Genie. These properties apply to all components created by the genie.

item.name: Grid is editable
item.description: Specify if the Grid components that are created should be editable. If editable, then the Detail View must be on. You can override this setting for any particular Grid component.

item.name: Grid part fields
item.description: Specify which fields should be included in the Grid Part. Primary key fields are always included. You can specify <AllFields> or count:Number (e.g. count:5) to include the first specified number of fields.

item.name: Grid name prefix
item.description: For each Grid component that is created, a default name will be used that is based on the table/view name from which the Grid is constructed. You can specify a prefix that should be used for the Grid name.

item.name: Overwrite option
item.description: If a Grid with the specified name already exists, what action should be taken? Prompt - prompt for action, Skip - do not create Grid, Rename - give the Grid a new name so that it does not overwrite the existing Grid, Overwrite - overwrite the existing Grid. Choices include *[ui:Prompt]*, *[ui:Skip]*, *[ui:Rename]*, *[ui:Overwrite]*.

item.name: Has Search Part
item.description: Specify if the Grid components that are created should have the Search Part turned on. You can override this setting for any particular Grid component.

item.name: Search part fields
item.description: Specify which fields should be included in the Search Part. Primary key fields are always included. You can specify <AllFields> or count:Number (e.g. count:5) to include the first specified number of fields.

item.name: Can be hidden
item.description: Specify if the Search Part can be hidden.

item.name: Initial display state
item.description: Specify the Search Part initial state Choices include *[ui:Open]*, *[ui:Closed]*.

item.name: Search part title
item.description: Specify the Search Part title when it is shown.

item.name: Search part title (hidden)
item.description: Specify the Search Part title when it is hidden.

item.name: Has Detail View Part
item.description: Specify if the Grid components that are created should have the Detail View Part turned on. You can override this setting for any particular Grid component.

item.name: Detail View part fields
item.description: Specify which fields should be included in the Detail View Part. Primary key fields are always included. You can specify <AllFields> or count:Number (e.g. count:5) to include the first specified number of fields.

item.name: Detail View title
item.description: Specify the title for the Detail View.

item.name: Detail View position
item.description: Specify where the Detail View should be shown. Choices include *[ui:PopupWindow-Modal]*, *[ui:PopupWindow-Modeless]*, *[ui:InGrid]*, *[ui:OnPage]*.

item.name: Pre-fetch data
item.description: Specify if the data for the Detail View should be pre-fetched. This will speed up the display of the Detail View for an individual record, but will slow down the initial display of the Grid.

item.name: Tabbed UI Component name
item.description: Specify the name of the Tabbed UI component that should be created.

item.name: Style name
item.description: Specify the default style for each component that will be created. You can override this setting for any particular component.

item.name: Header
item.description: Specify the header text for the Tabbed UI component.

item.name: Footer
item.description: Specify the footer text for the Tabbed UI component.

item.name: A5ContainerClass class padding
item.description: Every control is wrapped in a div with the class of 'a5container'. The padding specified here is the minimum space between adjacent controls. Use CSS syntax to specify padding. e.g. 10px, .1in, etc.

item.name: Left padding
item.description: Specify the padding between the left edge of page and the buttons in the Tabbed UI component. Use CSS syntax to specify padding. e.g. 10px, .1in, etc.

item.name: Top padding
item.description: Specify the padding between the top edge of the Button section and the first button in the Tabbed UI component. Use CSS syntax to specify padding. e.g. 10px, .1in, etc.

item.name: Button width
item.description: Specify the width of each button in the Tabbed UI component. Use CSS syntax. e.g. 10px, .1in, etc.

item.name: Button spacing
item.description: Specify the vertical spacing between each button in the Tabbed UI component. Use CSS syntax. e.g. 10px, .1in, etc.
